data.description: This setting defines the X coordinate of the Z-seam when the 'Z seam alignment' is set to 'user specified'.
data.img_description: The left model has the seam on the left, the X-value is zero. The right model has the seam on the right, the X-value is 300.
data.hints: - The coordinates are calculated absolute or relative depending on the preference of the user.
